title: Microelectronic Circuits
description: Basic concepts of microelectronic materials, devices, and circuits.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 2040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and (MATH 2401 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2411 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 24X1 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2551 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2561 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2X51 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and (MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T)
